duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage complex and enterprise-wide domains consisting of multiple projects, ensuring integration and scope adjustments based on business needs.
Analyze data, synthesize information, and deliver meaningful reports to drive project milestones.
Communicate project strategy, direction, and changes to senior leadership and business stakeholders.
Deliver IT projects on time, meeting strategic and business requirements, while tracking milestones and recommending adjustments.
Facilitate Agile ceremonies, establish milestones, monitor adherence to plans, and identify delivery risks with mitigation strategies.
Coordinate across multiple engineering teams, serving as a conduit between the business and engineering to ensure requirements are incorporated.
Escalate risks and issues, analyze cross-functional requirements, define development processes and SLAs.
Ensure high-quality product delivery to end users within agreed time-to-market deadlines, guiding the team in user stories and product demos.
Manage collaboration and data repository tools such as Jira, Confluence, and SharePoint.
Update project backlogs, release calendar, and facilitate Agile ceremonies and Domain Intake Meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, Business Administration, or related field, or equivalent work experience
